content:
It's great that you're getting your Giant TCR Advanced serviced!

$120 sounds like a reasonable quote for the repairs, depending on the extent of the work needed. Giant bikes are known for their high-quality components and craftsmanship, so it's good that you're taking the time to get it serviced properly.

Fingers crossed that the repair shop gets back to you soon with a positive update on your bike's status. In the meantime, you can start preparing for your next ride by checking the weather forecast, planning your route, and getting your gear in order.

If you don't mind me asking, what kind of repairs is your bike undergoing? Is it a routine maintenance check, or did you notice some issues that needed attention?
